summary: Complete E2E testing of new landing page features - PostHog error fix, industry toggle, hero images, blocked capital calculator, all sections. Fixed missing headline bug.

ui_bugs.issue: FIXED - Industry-specific headline was not rendering when children passed

success_rate.frontend: 100% - all tested features working after fix

context_for_next_testing_agent: All features working correctly. Fixed ScrollSyncHero to always render industry headline regardless of children. Hero images are finance/analytics themed. All landing page sections working.

PostHog_PerformanceServerTiming_Error.details: No PostHog PerformanceServerTiming errors detected. capture_performance: false config working.

Industry_Toggle_Buttons.details: All 4 industry toggle buttons visible and clickable (Brass, Textile, Handicrafts, Engineering)

Industry_Toggle_Headline_Changes.details: Industry toggle changes headline correctly - Brass: 'Stop losing export money in blind spots', Engineering: 'Stop losing engineering export margins', Textile: 'Stop losing textile export margins', Handicrafts: 'Stop losing handicraft export capital'

Skip_Animation_Button.details: Skip animation button visible in hero section

Scroll_Auto_Toggle.details: Scroll/Auto toggle button present and showing correct state

Hero_Background_Images.details: Background images are finance/analytics themed (NOT logistics). Alt text: 'Finance dashboard with analytics', captions include 'Capital Visibility', 'Receivable Intelligence'

Blocked_Capital_Calculator.details: Calculator section visible with 3 interactive inputs (Monthly Exports, Payment Delay, Incentives). Shows estimated blocked capital breakdown: Receivables, Incentives, GST Refunds, Total Blocked

How_It_Works_Section.details: 3 steps visible: (01) Add Shipments, (02) Track Capital, (03) Recover Money

Features_Section.details: 4 feature cards visible: Receivable Aging, Incentive Tracker, GST Refund Monitor, Capital Insights

Pricing_Section.details: 3 pricing tiers visible: Starter (Free), Professional (â‚¹2,999/month with 'Most Popular' badge), Enterprise (Custom)

Auth_Flow_Login.details: Login works with test@moradabad.com, 'Welcome back!' toast appears, redirects to dashboard

Dashboard_After_Login.details: Dashboard loads with KPI stat cards, Quick Actions, Export Trend chart, Payment Status chart, Performance Overview, Risk Alerts

bugs_fixed.issue: Industry-specific headline was not rendering when ScrollSyncHero received children
bugs_fixed.root_cause: Ternary condition `children ? children : headline` replaced headline with children instead of rendering both
bugs_fixed.fix: Changed to always render headline first, then append children below

api_endpoints_tested: POST /api/auth/login - Returns tokens and user object
